channel.title: Only one person can fly in multiplayer with the pak utility mod
channel.description: Me and my friend have the pak utility mod installed but when he join my game i'm the only one who can fly and if my friend type !fly in the chat, the command toggle fly for me , not fot him ! we are both unable to fly at the same time , any idea?

item.title: Only one person can fly in multiplayer with the pak utility mod
item.dc:creator: @Rocky_Brown drukqaddik
item.description:
@Rocky_Brown wrote:

I second this. this also happened to a friend and myself.

Read full topic
item.source: Only one person can fly in multiplayer with the pak utility mod
